title: Vivo T4x Launches in India with 6,500mAh Battery & 120Hz Display
summary: Vivo has introduced its latest budget smartphone, the Vivo T4x, in the Indian market. The device's standout features include a massive 6,500mAh battery and a smooth 120Hz display, targeting users who prioritize long battery life and performance.
content:
Vivo has launched the Vivo T4x in India, staying true to its promise. This budget smartphone stands out for its large battery, making it a great choice for heavy users.

The device features a massive 6,500mAh battery, which positions it as one of the largest battery capacities in its segment. The phone also comes with a 120Hz refresh rate display, ensuring smooth scrolling and enhanced visual experience.

In terms of performance, the Vivo T4x is equipped with modern hardware suitable for daily tasks and moderate gaming. The device maintains Vivo's reputation for delivering value-focused smartphones in the Indian market.

## Key Features
The Vivo T4x in India has arrived as promised, standing out as a budget smartphone with an emphasis on battery life—ideal for power users.

## Battery and Display
* Massive 6,500mAh battery capacity
* One of the largest battery offerings in its segment
* 120Hz refresh rate display
* Smooth scrolling experience
* Enhanced visual performance

## Performance
The Vivo T4x comes equipped with modern hardware that handles:
* Daily tasks efficiently
* Moderate gaming capabilities

The device continues Vivo's tradition of delivering value-oriented smartphones to the Indian market.
